abilities.name: Death Coil
abilities.description: Deals 164 damage to target enemy. Can be self-cast to heal for 262 Health.

abilities.name: Howling Blast
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Tempest
abilities.description: Deal 40 damage per second to nearby enemies and Slow their Movement Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Frozen Tempest's effects last for 1.5 seconds.

heroics.name: Army of the Dead
heroics.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 Health.

heroics.name: Summon Sindragosa
heroics.description: Deals 230 damage and slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.
